subject: Business
title: The Lean Startup Method
description: A quick win: understand The Lean Startup Method.

hook.text: Eric Ries kept building products nobody wanted. Then he found a faster way to learn.

buildup.text: The lean method says: state a hypothesis, build the smallest test, and measure the result.

discovery.text: This loop â€” build, measure, learn â€” replaces months of planning with weeks of real evidence.

twist.text: Most founders skip 'measure' and jump from building to building. Speed without learning is waste.

climax.text: Dropbox didn't build a product first. They posted a demo video and measured signups.

punchline.text: The goal isn't shipping fast. It's learning fast.

quiz.question: What is the core loop of the Lean Startup method?
